name: Untitled Pirate Game - Prototype Demo
description:
- Choose your primary and secondary paths (which will affect the cards you'll be playing with) out of four, each with a different playstyle!

-  Discover dozens of new cards to add to your deck with each attempt at reaching the final boss.

- Every run has a different layout, choose a risky or safe path, face different enemies, choose different cards, and even fight different bosses!

Much more to come in future releases!
